arStrings.szText: "You seem lost in thought. Do you have a plan to save the Iron Wolves?"
The Iron Wolves are being hunted by a demon. It stalks us, exploits us, sets us against one another.
thinking aloud, stepping through what she knows
And now I hear its voice. The demon beckons me to its lair in the wilds, where it would tempt me, then discard me. But it doesn't expect you.
Let us spring the trap. We play along, draw the demon out of hiding. And just when it thinks it has won, we strike. I will go aheadâ€”follow me when you are ready. We end this together.
